Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: MADHUBHAAR STANZA

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: (ਜਿਸ ਉਤੇ ਦੁਨੀਆ) ਮੋਹਿਤ ਹੋਈ ਦਿਖਦੀ ਹੈ,

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: Seeing him, Dutt, the king of Yogis, who was in the garb of a Rawal, and who was theking of Sannyasis, and respectable for all, he was allured towards him.233.
He saw him like pure moon and found him that his actions were immaculate and in accordance with Yoga.234.

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: ਜੋ ਸੰਨਿਆਸ ਦੇ ਭੇਖ ਵਾਲਾ ਹੈ,

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: That Sannyasi king was the destroyer of impiety, he went everywhere in his kingdom and was the abode of Dharma.235.

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: ਜੋ ਨਾ ਛਿਜਣ ਵਾਲੇ ਯੋਗ ਵਾਲਾ ਹੈ,
ਲੋਕਾਂ ਦੀ ਪਹੁੰਚ ਤੋਂ ਪਰੇ ਹੈ।

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: His Yoga was indestructible and wearing his loin-cloth, he moved everywhere in his kingdom.236.

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: ਜੋ ਨਾ ਛਿਜਣ ਵਾਲੇ ਕਰਮਾਂ ਵਾਲਾ ਹੈ,

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: His action and duties were illustrious and not liable to decay
He was the commander of all and was like a stream of Sannyas.237.

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: ਜੋ ਅਗਿਆਨ ਨੂੰ ਨਸ਼ਟ ਕਰਨ ਵਾਲਾ ਹੈ,
(ਸੰਸਾਰ ਤੋਂ) ਪਾਰ ਦੀ ਜਾਣਨ ਵਾਲਾ ਹੈ,
ਅਧਰਮ ਨੂੰ ਖ਼ਤਮ ਕਰਨ ਵਾਲਾ ਹੈ

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: He was the destroyer of ignorance, skilful in sciences, the destroyer of impiety and a devotee of Sannyasis.238.
He was the servitor of the Lord, he was felt everywhere by his subjects, a king in Sannyas and he was embellished with all learnings.239.

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: ਜੋ (ਸੰਸਾਰ ਤੋਂ) ਪਾਰ ਦੀ ਜਾਣਨ ਵਾਲਾ ਹੈ,
ਅਧਰਮ ਨੂੰ ਨਸ਼ਟ ਕਰਨ ਵਾਲਾ ਹੈ,

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: He was the destroyer of impiety, a devotee of the path of Sannyas, of Jivan-mukta (redeemed while living) and was skilful in all learnings.240.
He was absorbed in good deeds, an unattached Yogi
He was like unmanifested Dharma devoid of Yoga his limbs were healthy.241.
He was never in ire, even slightly

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: ਸ਼ਰੀਰ ਵਿਚ ਜ਼ਰਾ ਜਿੰਨਾ ਰੋਸ ਨਾ ਰਖਣ ਵਾਲਾ,

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: No vice touched him and he ever flowed like the river of Dharma.242.
He adopted Sannyas and was the supreme authority of Yoga
He was the devotee of Brahman, the originator of the world.243.
That king wearing matted locks, had abandoned all the stores of materials
And he wore waist-cloth.24.

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: ਅਤੇ ਭੰਗ ਦਾ ਸੇਵਨ ਕਰਨ ਵਾਲਾ ਹੈ ॥੨੪੪॥
ਜੋ ਸੰਨਿਆਸ ਕਰਮ ਨੂੰ ਕਰਨ ਵਾਲਾ,

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: He performed actions of Sannyas and adopted Rawal religion
He always remained in bliss and was the destroyer of lust etc.245.

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: ਅਤੇ ਕਾਮ ਆਦਿ (ਵਿਕਾਰਾਂ ਨੂੰ) ਕੁਚਲਣ ਵਾਲਾ ਹੈ ॥੨੪੫॥

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: The tabors were being played, hearing which all the sins had fled away

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: ਜੋ ਵਿਭੂਤੀ ਨਾਲ ਸ਼ੋਭਾ ਪਾ ਰਿਹਾ ਹੈ

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: His body had been smeared with ashes and all were getting allured towards him.246.

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: ਅਤੇ ਸਾਰਿਆਂ ਨੂੰ ਮੋਹ ਰਿਹਾ ਹੈ ॥੨੪੬॥
ਜੋ ਲੰਗੋਟ ਨੂੰ ਬੰਨ੍ਹਣ ਵਾਲਾ ਹੈ

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: He wore loin-cloth and spoke occasionally

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: ਅਤੇ (ਜਿਸ ਨੂੰ) ਇਕ ਆਦਿ (ਕਾਲ ਤੋਂ ਮੌਜੂਦ ਦੀ) ਹੀ ਇੱਛਾ ਹੈ।
ਜੋ ਧਰਮ ਨੂੰ ਧਾਰਨ ਕਰਨ ਵਾਲਾ ਹੈ

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: He was the adopter of piety and destroyer of sin.247.

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: ਅਤੇ ਪਾਪਾਂ ਨੂੰ ਹਰਨ ਵਾਲਾ ਹੈ ॥੨੪੭॥
ਜਿਸ ਦਾ ਨਿਰੰਤਰ ਨਾਦ ਵਜ ਰਿਹਾ ਹੈ,

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: The horn was being blown and the sins were running away

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: (ਜਿਸ ਕਰ ਕੇ) ਘੋਰ ਪਾਪ ਭਜ ਰਹੇ ਹਨ,

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: The orders were given there that the religious texts be read.248.

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: ਅਤੇ (ਮਨ ਦੀਆਂ) ਗੰਢਾਂ (ਗ੍ਰੰਥੀਆਂ) ਨੂੰ ਖੋਲ੍ਹਦੇ ਹਨ ॥੨੪੮॥
ਧਰਮ ਰਾਜ ਦੇ ਸਰੂਪ ਵਾਲਾ ਹੈ,

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: In that holy country, assuming the religious garb, the prayer was being held, thinking of that one wearing the lion-cloth as effulgence.249.

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: ਅਖੰਡ ਜੋਤਿ ਦੀ ਬੰਦਨਾ ਕਰਨ ਵਾਲਾ ਹੈ ॥੨੪੯॥

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: He was devoid of misfortune and attached to Sannyas
He was supremely immaculate and friend of all.250.
He was absorbed in yoga, having indescribable form

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: ਨਾ ਭੰਗ ਹੋਣ ਵਾਲੇ ਯੋਗ ਵਾਲਾ,

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: He was a Sannyasi king.251.

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: ਜੋ (ਬਵੰਜਾ) ਬੀਰਾਂ ਦੀ ਅਰਾਧਨਾ ਕਰਨ ਵਾਲਾ,

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: He was the hero of heroes and practiser of all the disciplines
He was a Sannyasi, performing underrfiled actions.252.
He was like that Lord, who is imperishable, and just, the remover of injustice.253.

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: ਜੋ ਕਰਮਾਂ ਦਾ ਨਾਸ਼ ਕਰਨ ਵਾਲਾ ਹੈ,

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: He was the destroyer of Karmas, the servitor of all, everywhere, unattached and glorious.254.

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: ਜੋ ਸਭ ਵਿਚ ਗਮਨ ਕਰਨ ਵਾਲਾ,

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: He was the goer to all the places, the remover of sins, beyond all ailments and the one who remained a pure Yogi.255.

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: ਅਤੇ ਰੋਗਾਂ ਨੂੰ ਤਿਆਗਣ ਵਾਲਾ ਹੈ ॥੨੫੫॥

lines.gurmukhi: ieiq surQ rwjw XwrRhmo gurU brnnµ smwpqM ]11]

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: End of the description of the Elventh Guru, the king Surath.

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: ਇਥੇ ਸੁਰਥ ਰਾਜਾ ਯਾਰ੍ਹਵੇਂ ਗੁਰੂ ਦਾ ਵਰਣਨ ਸਮਾਪਤ ॥੧੧॥
